languages.text: "Распри "уважаемых" господ отличаются от теневых разборок лишь пышными нарядами. Захочешь по-тихому убрать мерзавца — только кликни, старик".
"The only difference between high-society squabbles and squabbles down in the gutter is the fine clothes. If you want to quietly get rid of the scoundrel, you know who to call, old man."
languages.original_text: "Распри "уважаемых" господ отличаются от теневых разборок лишь пышными нарядами. Захочешь по-тихому убрать мерзавца — только кликни, старик".

traits.locale_text: "The only difference between high-society squabbles and squabbles down in the gutter is the fine clothes. If you want to quietly get rid of the scoundrel, you know who to call, old man."
"The only difference between high-society squabbles and squabbles down in the gutter is the fine clothes. If you want to quietly get rid of the scoundrel, you know who to call, old man."
"The only difference between high-society squabbles and squabbles down in the gutter is the fine clothes. If you want to quietly get rid of the scoundrel, you know who to call, old man."
"The only difference between high-society squabbles and squabbles down in the gutter is the fine clothes. If you want to quietly get rid of the scoundrel, you know who to call, old man."

languages.text: “上流社会的冲突与底层社会的冲突只有一个区别，那就是有没有穿着漂亮的衣服。如果你打算悄悄解决掉这个恶棍的话，你知道该找谁，老家伙。”
languages.original_text: "The only difference between high-society squabbles and squabbles down in the gutter is the fine clothes. If you want to quietly get rid of the scoundrel, you know who to call, old man."

traits.locale_text: “上流社会的冲突与底层社会的冲突只有一个区别，那就是有没有穿着漂亮的衣服。如果你打算悄悄解决掉这个恶棍的话，你知道该找谁，老家伙。”

languages.text: « La seule différence entre les querelles de la haute société et celles des gens du commun dans la rue, c'est la qualité des vêtements. Si vous voulez vous débarrasser de cette vermine en toute discrétion, vous savez à qui vous adresser, le vieux. »
languages.original_text: "The only difference between high-society squabbles and squabbles down in the gutter is the fine clothes. If you want to quietly get rid of the scoundrel, you know who to call, old man."

traits.locale_text: « La seule différence entre les querelles de la haute société et celles des gens du commun dans la rue, c'est la qualité des vêtements. Si vous voulez vous débarrasser de cette vermine en toute discrétion, vous savez à qui vous adresser, le vieux. »

languages.text: «La única diferencia entre las disputas de la alta sociedad y las de lo más bajo es la elegancia de la ropa. Si quiere que alguien se deshaga de ese rufián sin armar jaleo, ya sabe a quién acudir».
languages.original_text: "The only difference between high-society squabbles and squabbles down in the gutter is the fine clothes. If you want to quietly get rid of the scoundrel, you know who to call, old man."

traits.locale_text: «La única diferencia entre las disputas de la alta sociedad y las de lo más bajo es la elegancia de la ropa. Si quiere que alguien se deshaga de ese rufián sin armar jaleo, ya sabe a quién acudir».

languages.text: 「上流社会と下層社会のいざこざの違いは、上等な服装だけだよ。悪党をそっと追い出したいなら、誰に頼めばいいかわかってるだろ、じいさん」
languages.original_text: "The only difference between high-society squabbles and squabbles down in the gutter is the fine clothes. If you want to quietly get rid of the scoundrel, you know who to call, old man."

traits.locale_text: 「上流社会と下層社会のいざこざの違いは、上等な服装だけだよ。悪党をそっと追い出したいなら、誰に頼めばいいかわかってるだろ、じいさん」

languages.text: "Der einzige Unterschied zwischen Zankereien in der feinen Gesellschaft und Zankereien in der Gosse sind die feinden Gewänder. Wenn Ihr den Halunken unauffällig loswerden wollt, wisst Ihr ja, an wen Ihr Euch wenden müsst, alter Mann."
languages.original_text: "The only difference between high-society squabbles and squabbles down in the gutter is the fine clothes. If you want to quietly get rid of the scoundrel, you know who to call, old man."

traits.locale_text: "Der einzige Unterschied zwischen Zankereien in der feinen Gesellschaft und Zankereien in der Gosse sind die feinden Gewänder. Wenn Ihr den Halunken unauffällig loswerden wollt, wisst Ihr ja, an wen Ihr Euch wenden müsst, alter Mann."

languages.original_text: "The only difference between high-society squabbles and squabbles down in the gutter is the fine clothes. If you want to quietly get rid of the scoundrel, you know who to call, old man."

languages.text: "Yüksek sosyete kavgaları ile kenar mahalle kavgaları arasındaki tek fark, kıyafetlerin kalitesi. Alçak heriften sessiz sedasız kurtulmak istersen kime başvuracağını biliyorsun ihtiyar."
languages.original_text: "The only difference between high-society squabbles and squabbles down in the gutter is the fine clothes. If you want to quietly get rid of the scoundrel, you know who to call, old man."

traits.locale_text: "Yüksek sosyete tartışmaları ve kenar mahalle tartışmaları arasındaki tek fark kıyafetlerin kalitesidir. Alçaklardan sessiz sedasız kurtulmak istiyorsan kimi arayacağını biliyorsun ihtiyar."
